notes: Applies to vehicle manufacturers (OEMs) for type approval of vehicles that allow software updates (categories M, N, O, R, S, T)
Tier 1/2 suppliers providing software components must support OEM SUMS requirements
R156 applies to type approval, not vehicle operation; fleet operators receive updates as end users
ECU and software component manufacturers must provide RXSWIN and support OTA update mechanisms
OTA update infrastructure providers (backend servers, CDN) must meet security requirements for software distribution
R156 is specific to vehicle software updates; financial services not in scope
R156 is specific to vehicle software updates; healthcare not in scope
R156 is specific to vehicle software updates; energy sector not in scope
